snippet: The apparel company co-founder has amassed more than 20,000 paintings by artists from 120 countries through his “Imago Mundi” project, with postcard-sized works now showing in China....
abstract: Luciano Benetton's Imago Mundi project includes Contemporary China 1949-2019, program to commission works by country's ethnic minority artists; works will join those in traveling show Under One Sky for 2019 exhibition commemorating 70th anniversary of People’s Republic of China.
lead_paragraph: The apparel company co-founder has amassed more than 20,000 paintings by artists from 120 countries through his “Imago Mundi” project, with postcard-sized works now showing in China.

headline.main: Luciano Benetton Presents Art Collection in China
headline.print_headline: Luciano Benetton Presents Art Collection in China
